name: The Knave
desc:
The Knave, Fourth of the Fatui Harbingers.

The ancient balemoon blood flows within her fate, granting her all that the dynasty once had — yearning, power, and curses alike.

In her short life, she has supped of countless agonies and drunk deep of the cup of suffering, just as her ancestors once did when they imbibed poison at the rising of the dark sun.

Still, neither suffering nor fate has proved a fatal toxin to her.

Instead, they are the firewood fueling her quietly burning hearth, and are the fire bringing her children warmth.

Someday, the hearth-fire's faint radiance shall burn the old world away, incinerating the final scion of the baleful moon as well.

Someday, these still immature children will break free of ancient fate and usher in the future without tears she dreams of.

But until that time comes, until dawn breaks, the one named Peruere shall stand guard over their fragile, sweet dreams.

"If fate should pave for us a pale road, let us dye it the bloody crimson of the bale moon."

"Even a flickering, famished fire can burn all suffering away before daybreak."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>The Same Mistakes</color>
"Ranged combat is advantageous to us... Huh!?"

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Absolutio Absoluta Absolutissime</color>
Album: Cantus Aeternus
Track: 39

<color=#ffd780>April 24, 2024</color>
Hello, Traveler!
After the Version 4.6 update, you will encounter a new boss "The Knave." Let's check out what special traits she has and how to deal with her~
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/27604025</color>

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Fading Candle
dropMaterial.desc:
A candle that you picked up in the ruins after completing the duel against The Knave.
Legends passed down claim that when the candle's flame flickers in the hands of sinners, the light may become shadows, making footsteps faint and masking fatal intent.
You cannot tell what material this is made of, and it weeps no wax after burning, releasing only black ash that scatters into the wind, drifting towards the distant unknown.

dropMaterial.name: Silken Feather
dropMaterial.desc:
A crystal that you picked up in the ruins after completing the duel against The Knave.

The already-cooled blood and fire still maintain the shape of a feather, that is framed with solidified sleek black threads.

Before their thoughts have matured, young children are reliant on the meticulous care of their parents, just as fledglings need the aegis of an adult wing.

It is to fulfill such wishes that "Father" wove dangerous spider-silk into a facsimile of feathers, that she might grant her family some warmth.

dropMaterial.name: Denial and Judgment
dropMaterial.desc:
An earring that you picked up in the ruins after completing the duel against The Knave.

The red symbol upon it resembles the image in her eyes, a declaration and a rejection alike.

The orphaned live lives filled with suffering from childhood — this she sees and keeps in her heart.

As fate casts an examining eye on humanity, so too will humans cast judgment upon fate.

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

dropMaterial.name: Dream Solvent
dropMaterial.desc:
An item capable of changing Character Level-Up Materials obtained from memories and trials into whatever form is needed.
People once believed that spirits and memories had some material form. If someone dreamed of heaven before waking up clutching a flower, then that blossom must have been made from such a fantasy. Dream Solvent dissolves that which is obtained from memory and transforms it into some other dream.
Indeed, blows traded with the strong are stepping stones towards becoming stronger yourself.

dropMaterial.name: Midlander Sword Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.

Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

dropMaterial.name: Midlander Bow Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.

Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

value.name: Arlecchino
value.desc: The Fourth of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers, known as The Knave. Her real name is Peruere.
